description:
Remove SEO Service and Add New Service Offerings

Update the website's services section to accurately reflect current offerings by removing SEO as a standalone monthly service, adding support for existing websites, and introducing business process automation services.

Requirements:

1. Remove SEO as Monthly Service
- Remove all references to SEO as a paid monthly/recurring service offering
- Retain mentions of SEO only in the context of standard web development (e.g., "websites built with SEO best practices" or "search-optimized sites included")
- Update navigation, service cards, pricing tables, and any call-to-action buttons that reference SEO services
- Check for and update any testimonials or case studies that prominently feature SEO services

2. Add Existing Website Support Service
- Create new service offering for maintaining and updating websites not originally built by you
- List common platforms that business owners will recognize: WordPress, Wix, Squarespace, Shopify, Weebly, GoDaddy Website Builder
- Include typical support activities: bug fixes, content updates, plugin/theme updates, security patches, design tweaks, feature additions
- Clarify that you work with sites regardless of original developer
- Add appropriate call-to-action and contact options for this service

3. Add Business Process Automation Service
- Create service offering for automating manual business processes and general technical assistance
- Frame as practical efficiency solutions for small business owners
- Include examples: automated invoicing/billing, data entry automation, workflow streamlining, integration between tools (email, CRM, spreadsheets), report generation, appointment scheduling automation
- Use accessible, non-technical language that emphasizes time savings and reduced errors
- Position as "done-for-you" technical solutions rather than consulting

4. Consistency Across Site
- Update homepage overview of services
- Revise services page with new structure
- Update any pricing or package information
- Modify contact forms if they reference specific services
- Review footer and any other navigation elements
- Ensure consistent messaging throughout all pages
title: Update service offerings: remove SEO, add automation
